item.title: attribute documentation : what, why, how?
item.description: Before I talk about the title of the post, I will take a diversion to try to explain what kernel hackers mean when they say they do not break userspace. What is an API and an ABI? API: Application Programming Interface ABI: Application Binary Interface The two terms are closely related and can be a source of confusion. Both APIs and ABIs specify how two components interact with each other.
